description: This file implements a simplified Ludo game engine with functions for game setup, move validation, applying moves, turn management, AI move selection, and win condition checking. It handles token positions, dice rolls, captures, and game state transitions.

methods.name: fairDiceRoll
methods.description: Performs a secure dice roll returning a number between 1 and 6 using crypto for randomness.

methods.name: createInitialState
methods.description: Initializes the game state for a given list of players, setting starting positions and game parameters.

methods.name: getValidMoves
methods.description: Determines the valid moves a player can make given their token positions and a dice roll.

methods.name: applyMove
methods.description: Applies a specified move to the game state, updating token positions, handling captures, and checking for token completion.

methods.name: advanceTurn
methods.description: Advances the game to the next turn, allowing an extra turn if the last roll was a six.

methods.name: chooseAiMove
methods.description: Selects the best move for AI players, prioritizing captures, else furthest progress.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Checks if a player has won by having all tokens finished.
